title: SMC compatibility
message:
820-3536 and 820-3476 are compatibly?

These boards are almost the same. Somebody try them?

title: SMC compatibility
message:
In my case I had shorted 3V42 rail because of SMC. I replaced the SMC and took it from 3476 board. After SMC replacment board power one time and load OS X but now it is no power anymore.

PP5V_S5 - 5V present
PP5V_S4 - 0V
32khz present
PM_RSMRST_L - missing
PP3V3_SUS - missing
P3V3SUS_EN - missing
PP3V3_S5 - 3.3V present

Any idea?

title: SMC compatibility
message:
As PM_RSMRST_L is missing, that mean SMC is bad again? As Haswell is waiting reset from SMC.

PM_SLP_S5_L - 0V never goes to 3V. I check it as soon as I connect adapter.

title: SMC compatibility
message: Could be anything. Check the usual corrosion around U6100 and resistors, clock chip, U1950, etc.
